headline: Ethereum Launches Mainnet
body: ETH trading opens in the broader crypto market.

headline: Bitcoin Halving
body: BTC block reward changes from 25 to 12.5 BTC.

headline: Crypto Risk Appetite Expands
body: Majors attract sustained momentum as participation broadens.

headline: Bitcoin Cash Fork
body: BTC chain split increases volatility during price discovery.

headline: Cboe BTC Futures Go Live
body: Institutional derivatives access adds momentum and volatility.

headline: CME BTC Futures Launch
body: Broader institutional participation expands derivatives market depth.

headline: 2018 Bear Regime
body: Risk-off sentiment dominates; liquidation pressure builds.

headline: Stabilization Year
body: Volatility cools while network fundamentals keep growing.

headline: March Liquidity Crash
body: Cross-asset deleveraging drives sharp crypto drawdown.

headline: Recovery Risk-On
body: Markets recover as liquidity and participation return.

headline: Bitcoin Halving
body: BTC block reward changes from 12.5 to 6.25 BTC.

headline: Meme Rotation Begins
body: Retail flow spills into meme assets.
